teams.name: GLBT (Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual, Transgender) Kivans & Friends
teams.loan_because: We are out and proud and know what it is like to face barriers. We are privileged to help our entrepreneurs achieve their own equality. We thank our friends who join us in our loans & in supporting GLBT rights.
teams.description: We are gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender, homosexual, and heterosexual people from all over the world.

teams.name: Indiana
teams.loan_because: We believe people around the world are connected and we can make a positive difference in others' lives.
teams.description:
Indiana is the 19th U.S. state and is located in the Midwest region of the United States of America. With over six million residents, it is ranked 15th in population and 17th in population density.

Indiana is a diverse state with a few large urban areas and a number of smaller industrial cities. It is best known for the Indianapolis 500 American automobile race, held annually over the Memorial Day weekend, and a strong basketball tradition, often called Hoosier Hysteria. Residents of Indiana are called Hoosiers. The state's name means "Land of the Indians."

Check out the distribution of our team's impact around the world: 
http://kivafolio.appspot.com/report?user=indiana

To see a map showing where Indiana team members are located, click the link below.

teams.name: University of Florida
teams.description: Students and Alumni of UF

teams.name: Tareto Maa
teams.description:
Tareto Maa is a grassroots nonprofit in Kenya, East Africa, whose objective is to empower the local community while eradicating the tradition of female genital mutilation (FGM) and child marriages within the Maasai people.  

The members of this Kiva group who are spokespersons of Tareto Maa are Gladys (TM Kenya), Jackie (TM USA), Philippe (TM Austria) and Armin (TM Germany). These members will publish project news on behalf of Tareto Maa. All other messages on the message board reflect private opinions of the group members.

The messages on the group’s board should discuss the work of Tareto Maa, further topics that relate to child rights, women's rights, community development, and the fight against gender-based violence, and also, of course, Kiva-related topics of all kinds.

For further information about Tareto Maa, please join our page on Facebook: www.facebook.com/TaretoMaa, or take a look at our WIKI: www.appropedia.org/Tareto_Maa 
This article describes why and how Tareto Maa was founded: http://worldpulse.com/node/62258

teams.name: Angela's Angels
teams.loan_because: we can.

teams.name: Christians Against Poverty
teams.loan_because: Christ's love compels us to help others who are in need.
teams.description: We are followers of Jesus who wish to be good stewards of what God has entrusted to us.  We want to help provide economic opportunities for people who are living in poverty.

teams.name: Marble Tree
teams.description: A family of lenders

teams.name: Laura's Fabulous 40th Fundraiser
teams.loan_because: To celebrate my 40th birthday I wanted to do something different than just the usual party. I chose to support Kiva because it demonstrates the power of the individual to affect change.
teams.description: We are a group of friends and family members who want to do good in the world, and maybe have some fun along the way!

teams.description: A support and study group of Christian women.

teams.name: Denmark
teams.loan_because:
All human beings are born free and equal in dignity and rights. They are endowed with reason and conscience and should act towards one another in a spirit of brotherhood. 
(Article 1  of United Nations Declaration of Human Rights)
teams.description:
Team for everyone in Denmark, who are taking part of this great opportunity to improve the world one step at a time.

Use this to recruite friends. http://www.kiva.org/invitedto/denmark/by/freetrial

Location: HeartMath Denmark
Street: Gammel Strand 34 . 4 floor , 1202 Copenhagen K

More Info:: Facebook-group: Kiva Denmark  link: http://www.facebook.com/groups/55972417726/

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Gruppen her er for alle i Danmark, der støtter denne fantastiske ide om at hjælpe verden ét skridt af gangen.

Vil du hjælpe: Inviter venner - fortæl om Kiva 
http://www.kiva.org/invitedto/denmark/by/freetrial

Kiva Denmark holder møder om hvad vi kan gøre for at udbrede kendskabet til denne unikke måde at hjælpe på. Kontakt: Kristine.flagstad@uni-c.dk hvis du har nogen ideer eller skriv en meddelelse her til gruppen.

Næste møde holdes hos: HeartMath Danmark
Adresse: Gammel Strand 34 . 4 sal, 1202 Copenhagen K
Dato: Ikke fastlagt pt. 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Se evt. mere på facebook gruppen : http://www.facebook.com/groups/55972417726/

teams.loan_because: We believe in the generosity of the human spirit that is still alive within Americans of all backgrounds.

teams.name: Cheese Fanciers
teams.whereabouts: Everywhere a good cheese is enjoyed.
teams.loan_because: there is nothing like a good cheese, and we support those who make and sell cheeses and related dairy products around the world.
teams.description: I've often searched for a team to which I could credit my cheese-related loans, and finally realized it was time to create one. Let's support cheesemongers and cheesemakers worldwide whose passion matches our own.

teams.name: Urgent EVOKE
teams.loan_because: We EVOKE. We are devoted to making our world a better place to live in.
teams.description: We are a group of people from across the world who interact using an online community called Urgent EVOKE. Our community's goal is to LEARN about the world's problems and those already working to fix them, to ACT out our ideas and to IMAGINE how the world could be.

teams.name: Safe Girls Team
teams.loan_because: By empowering girls and women in the fight for women's rights, poverty reduction, education and health promotion, we are helping to create a fairer and better world for everyone.
teams.description:
This team supports the work of Kiva, improving the lives of people around the world who have limited financial means, and who would not otherwise have the means to improve their lives, those of their families, and their communities.

We also raise awareness of the issues of  violence against girls and women including fgm, education, maternal health and human rights.

This month we deal with the issue of Human Trafficking, a problem fuelled by poverty, and one which affects millions of women and children every year.

 A video explanation of what Trafficking is:

www.no-trafficking.org/

 A personal account:

http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/world/europe/7243612.stm

Videos:

www.theguardian.com/global-development/audioslideshow/2013/dec/11/human-cost-sex-trafficking-prostitution-audio-slideshow

www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-us-canada-18144333

This four week free of charge course on Human Trafficking begins on 20th August, 2014.

www.coursera.org/course/humantrafficking

 Detailed information about child trafficking:

www.childtrafficking.com/Content/sitemap.php

 To report a trafficking crime:

 In the USA:

www.fbi.gov/about-us/investigate/civilrights/human_trafficking

 In the UK:

https://crimestoppers-uk.org/get-involved/our-campaigns/national-campaigns/human-trafficking

Courses our team members might be interested in joining for free: 

Coursera:     
                                              
https://www.coursera.org/course/water 26th May, 2014

Edx:

Resilience https://www.edx.org/course/uwashingtonx/uwashingtonx-ecfs311x-becoming-resilient-1652#.UznR_Gco-M9  6th May,2014


We have been informed that “It is against Kiva’s terms of use http://www.kiva.org/legal/terms to use team message boards or personal lender pages for self-promotion or to solicit funding for things not related to Kiva.”

For anyone needing further information about Kiva's policy on people requesting money for themselves, other individuals or organisations on Kiva web pages please contact Kiva.

Safe Girls Team Captains.

teams.name: David & Anjali's Wedding Team
teams.loan_because: it is a great way to invest in the dreams of others.

teams.name: Nurses and other Health Professionals
teams.loan_because: We care about doing real things to alleviate human suffering.
teams.description: We welcome all health professionals and also those who care about health issues and relieving suffering.  Whoever you are, let's work together to encourage each other in support of Kiva's microloans and the entreprenuers they fund.

teams.name: Poverty2Prosperity.org - Poverty-Escape
teams.loan_because: Poverty2Prosperity.org (P2P) is all about Poverty-Escape. Please join our fun team and put Poverty-Escape in the lead!  See how to get your I'm a Kiva Loaner Bracelet and more by participating on Team P2P - visit our web site for details!
teams.description:
One of P2P's major poverty-escaping projects is to participate in making microloans through the Kiva platform. See the web site for details on all of our projects. Also see our Perpetual Fund lender account which allows people to designate funds for perpetual loaning here on Kiva, http://www.kiva.org/lender/P2PPerpetualFund

We have a special purpose fund to keep loans from expiring. Please join us at http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans to see currently funding loans from the SOS Loan fund.

NOTE:  Poverty2Prosperity is also a non-profit, and any messages not related to Kiva or Poverty2Prosperity may be deleted.  If there is an idea you would like to share, contact one of the Team Captains to get permission.  Thank you for your consideration.

teams.name: Friends of Bob Harris
teams.loan_because:
After stumbling into a job as a luxury travel writer, I saw so much poverty that I decided to turn those paychecks into Kiva loans. Then I visited a bunch of clients, who were amazing, and I've written a book about it called "The International Bank of Bob" (Walker/Bloomsbury, March 5, 2013).

I hope the book will get more people to feel a greater understanding of Kiva, a better appreciation of the role of microfinance, and most of all, more connected to the rest of the world.
teams.description: People who realize that if we switched places with the recipients, they'd loan to us just as happily.  So, fair's fair.

teams.name: Homes & Land
teams.loan_because: As entrepreneurs, we understand the importance and value of self-employment. Although at times difficult, the benefit to both the business owner and surrounding community is immeasurable.
teams.description: We are Publishers, sales people, graphic artists all involved with helping others find a new home.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: Global Team Players Foundation
teams.loan_because: We believe athletes can have a significant impact on the world.
teams.description: The GTP Kiva Lending Team lends to borrowers who are a current or former athletes who need support for their business or educational aspirations or who are supporting their children with athletic, academic, and career aspirations. GTP empowers athletes to engage the community in philanthropy.

teams.name: Calgary, Canada
teams.loan_because: Living in such a great city as Calgary with all the opportunities that entails, surely we can make an effort to help others less fortunate. We all can make a big difference with just a small loan.
teams.description:
This team is for residents of Calgary, former residents, people wtih friends and family here or for anyone who really loves the city!

To those who do not wish to receive an email when messages are posted to the board, there is a simple fix: Go to your portfolio, then your account, then email preferences and you can disable/enable from there. I myself have turned it off as I am a member of several groups and do not want to receive masses of emails.

teams.description: We are folks who live, work, play in (or just like) the North Park neighborhood in Chicago, Illinois, USA

teams.name: Malaysia
teams.loan_because: we are Malaysians and we care.
teams.description: We're Malaysians interested in helping make lives better for the poor, so tell your friends about Kiva, & invite your friends to this group :)

teams.name: Kiva Muslims
teams.loan_because:
002.271 Yusuf Ali Translation:
If ye disclose (acts of) charity, even so it is well, but if ye conceal them, and make them reach those (really) in need, that is best for you: It will remove from you some of your (stains of) evil. And Allah is well acquainted with what ye do.
teams.description: Insha'Allah our team will be a collaboration of people from all walks of life united by one goal: to help those less fortunate and displaying great appreciation to our creator for blessing us to help make a differerence in the world.

teams.name: New Space
teams.loan_because: We are entrepreneurs, and microfinance is the foundation of wide entrepreneurship.
teams.description:
New Space is working toward innovative, affordable, and accessible spaceflight for people and scientific payloads.

Members of this team are employees and customers of New Space companies, people who want to go to space, and other fans.

teams.name: Maria Shriver + A Woman's Nation
teams.loan_because: For as little as $25, we can help women entrepreneurs right in our own backyard.
teams.description:
Continuing what she began as First Lady of California, Maria Shriver and A Woman’s Nation are partnering with Kiva, the world's first person-to-person microlending website, to empower thousands of women across America to become more financially independent. Our partnership shows that every loan you make to a woman entrepreneur – even $25 – will make a real difference. 

As "The Shriver Report: A Woman’s Nation Pushes Back from the Brink"* states, 1 in 3 American women lives on or near the brink of poverty. By starting or expanding her own business, a woman can lift herself and her family off the brink. JOIN US in moving women and families forward!

A Woman’s Nation™ is a nonprofit organization founded by Maria Shriver that imagines a new way forward for women and men, girls and boys. Through its multimedia initiatives and innovative partnerships, A Woman's Nation informs, inspires, and implements bold ideas into action with the goal of creating a culture where all lives and all work are respected, recognized, and valued. To learn more please visit AWomansNation.org.
 
* A project of A Woman's Nation, produced in partnership with Center for American Progress.

teams.description: Kiva lenders located in MN, USA

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142
teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Australia

teams.name: Animal Lovers
teams.loan_because: Even as animals living in a developed country - we are better off  than humans in many parts of the world.
teams.description: We are animal lovers who want to help those less fortunate in the poor areas of the world.

teams.name: TRAVEL BUG
teams.loan_because: We travel the world and see many cultures and people, some not as fortunate as us. Hopefully the small input we make can change somebody's life.

teams.name: Libertarian Team
teams.loan_because: As libertarians, we favor voluntary charity over government force to bring about positive change.
teams.description: The libertarian philosophy is one of personal and economic freedom.  We advocate charity and free-markets over government coercion and force.

teams.name: Crazy Canucks
teams.loan_because: We live in a well-to-do nation and want to help those less fortunate than ourselves
teams.description: We are CANADIAN !!!

teams.name: Vegetarians and Vegans on Kiva
teams.loan_because: We have a vision of a healthier, more compassionate and sustainable world. Hard work is often not enough to escape poverty and we gladly welcome the opportunity to give people and their businesses a fighting chance. Our team focus is on making loans to borrowers who don't use animals in their businesses.
teams.description: We're vegetarians and vegans, and those thinking about making the change.  We welcome everyone regardless of their motivation for going veggie.

teams.name: DINKlife
teams.loan_because: We want to give back and help others in need, and as Dual Income No Kids couples, we have the time and resources to do so.
teams.description: We are 'Dual Income No Kids' couples making the most of life by helping others.

teams.name: Black Women in Europe™
teams.loan_because: We want to empower other women.
teams.description: An eclectic group of women living ordinary and extraordinary lives.

teams.name: Indiana
teams.loan_because: We believe people around the world are connected and we can make a positive difference in others' lives.
teams.description:
Indiana is the 19th U.S. state and is located in the Midwest region of the United States of America. With over six million residents, it is ranked 15th in population and 17th in population density.

Indiana is a diverse state with a few large urban areas and a number of smaller industrial cities. It is best known for the Indianapolis 500 American automobile race, held annually over the Memorial Day weekend, and a strong basketball tradition, often called Hoosier Hysteria. Residents of Indiana are called Hoosiers. The state's name means "Land of the Indians."

Check out the distribution of our team's impact around the world: 
http://kivafolio.appspot.com/report?user=indiana

To see a map showing where Indiana team members are located, click the link below.

teams.loan_because:
We have Cold Weather - Warm hearts !
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty. 

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:

teams.description: We're disciples of The Church of the Latter-Day Dude (Dudeism), a religion inspired by The Big Lebowski, Taoism, humanism and more. Despite the name, our efforts are not confined to those living only in urban environments.

teams.name: Better World
teams.loan_because: To help make the world better

teams.name: Better World Two
teams.loan_because: To help make the world better

teams.name: Thunderbird Global MBA community & friends
teams.whereabouts: Glendale, AZ and all over the world
teams.loan_because:
Thunderbird's mission statement is "We educate global leaders who create sustainable prosperity
worldwide", and Kiva's goals are consistent with our mission statement.
teams.description: We are affiliates of the Thunderbird Global School of Management, specifically Global MBA students.  The team is open to all current students, alums, professors, and friends.  We live and work all over the world, and are proud to be responsible global citizens and equally proud of our shared connection to Thunderbird.

teams.name: India
teams.loan_because: "What we should aim at is the creation of people power, which is opposed to the power of violence and is different from the coercive power of state." - Vinoba Bhave
teams.description:
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty.

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe. We love India - therefore we are the Kiva Team India. We love to use the Kiva concept to provide loans in India ! http://www.kiva.org/india

Funding loans from India: http://www.kiva.org/lend?countries=IN

http://www.kiva.org/updates/kiva/2012/08/15/kiva-launches-in-india.html

teams.name: MicroGraam...People Investing in People
teams.loan_because: MicroGraam is a peer-to-peer lending platform that empowers rural entrepreneurs with access to loans from socially minded investors. We aim to provide affordable, micro-loans to rural Indians who would not otherwise have access to financial services. We believe that access to low-cost credit is the first step to ending systemic financial exclusion and improving the lives of millions of people.
teams.description: Everyday at MicroGraam, we try to develop innovative solutions to provide the lowest-costing credit to our borrowers. We partner with small, local non-profit organizations that work closely with the communities to provide micro-loans and other supportive services. By leveraging technology, we are able to keep our costs low, and pass on these savings to borrowers and social investors. We hope you join us in bringing financial inclusions to the far reaches of India!

teams.name: Cheeseheads For Change
teams.loan_because: If you give a man a fish, you feed him for a day.  Now in the modern world, you can give that same man a loan to buy a fishing pole, he catches fish with his new pole to feed his family, his community improves because of his financial success, he pays the loan back, and  you can re-loan that money again to help someone else buy a fishing pole . . . wait, that sounds like a conspiracy by the Rapala Corporation to sell more fishing equipment, what are we supporting here ;-)
teams.description: Our Kiva lending team is a non-political group consisting of Green Bay Packers fans lovingly known as Cheeseheads, and anyone who lives in or has ties to the great state of Wisconsin and is interested in making the world a better place.

teams.name: Netherlands
teams.loan_because: het mensen helpt een zelfstandig bestaan op te bouwen.
teams.description: FairSpirit microkrediet promoot Kiva in Nederland. Doe jij ook mee met het FairSpirit team?

teams.name: Kiva Team Italia - Italy
teams.loan_because:
"Migliorare la vita degli altri migliora anche la tua" ....   .....  ...........
Improving lives of others also improves yours
teams.description:
Una bella fotografia della nostra splendida realtà… Bellissima, variegata, colorata, vivace… unica…. Italiana!!!!

--------------------------------

A beautiful picture of our wonderful reality… Beautiful, varied, colorful, lively.... unique……. Italian!

teams.description: One of Judaism's most famous scholars, Maimonides, said that the highest form of charity is to help someone no longer need charity - and lending to Kiva does that.

teams.name: Unitarian Universalists
teams.loan_because:
We believe in:
**The inherent worth and dignity of every person
**Justice, equity and compassion in human relations
**Acceptance of one another and encouragement to spiritual growth in our congregations
**A free and responsible search for truth and meaning
**The right of conscience and the use of the democratic process within our congregations and in society at large
**The goal of world community with peace, liberty, and justice for all
**Respect for the interdependent web of all existence of which we are a part.
teams.description:
We are UU congregations and individuals (including those who describe themselves as "active" or "backslid" or "interested friends" or "just looking") throughout the world. 
For more information on us, or to find a congregation near you, check out the main website for the Unitarian Universalist Association

teams.description:
One of P2P's major poverty-escaping projects is to participate in making microloans through the Kiva platform. See the web site for details on all of our projects. Also see our Perpetual Fund lender account which allows people to designate funds for perpetual loaning here on Kiva, http://www.kiva.org/lender/P2PPerpetualFund

We have a special purpose fund to keep loans from expiring. Please join us at http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans to see currently funding loans from the SOS Loan fund.

NOTE:  Poverty2Prosperity is also a non-profit, and any messages not related to Kiva or Poverty2Prosperity may be deleted.  If there is an idea you would like to share, contact one of the Team Captains to get permission.  Thank you for your consideration.

teams.description: We welcome everyone worldwide who has attended UC Berkeley or who is a friend of the university.  Help us make a difference!  Go Bears!

teams.name: Golfers for Change
teams.loan_because: We all are fortunate to play a sport that is built on the values of courtesy, fair play, and a desire to give back to those less fortunate than us...
teams.description: We are common people around the world that seek to help others help themselves and improve their lives.

teams.name: TWA Ambassadors
teams.loan_because: We have all traveled to exotic locations. We have seen poverty and  we are filled with a deep sense of gratitude for the lives we live. Life is not fair, but by donating only $25, we are able to help those less fortunate than ourselves.
teams.description: Ex-TWA'ers from around the world.

teams.name: Cape Air / Nantucket Airlines
teams.loan_because: We have always believed that, though we may be small, we should make every effort to enrich the communities that enrich us.
teams.description: We represent a unique airline that makes short flights to small communities worldwide.  We operate in various US States, The Caribbean, and Micronesia.

teams.name: American Airlines
teams.loan_because: To provide the wind beneath your wings!!!!
teams.description: Employees, friends, frequent flyers, retirees and relatives.

teams.name: Kiva Capitalists
teams.loan_because: Capital and business make the world go round; trade is a stabilizing force. Offering non-usurious loans to help people start businesses to provide others with goods and services they need or want is what capitalism is all about. We are all proud capitalists, and some of us are even unrepentant.
teams.description: Free markets, free minds. Hayek, Mises, Friedman.

teams.name: Kiva Lutherans
teams.loan_because: We love our neighbors as ourselves.
teams.description: Lutherans and allies of all walks of life. All are welcome here.

teams.name: Late Loaning Lenders
teams.loan_because:
We hate to see loans being left unfunded on 
Kiva. Although most of these loans are 
pre-funded by the Field Partners, the Field
Partners lose out on the capital if a loan
doesn't get funded on Kiva. We believe that 
this will damage the Field Partners in the long 
term and impair their capacity to make loans to new borrowers.

We can't save every red loan, but we try to
make a difference as in the Starfish Story:
http://67.199.70.191/articles/the-starfish-story.aspx
Help us fund loans we're already supporting:
http://www.kiva.org/team/late_loaning_lenders/loans?status=fundRaising


Check out Charlotte's Web: http://starfish.dynalias.org

This watchlist for loans suggested by the team members (starfish + offlist) shows:
* the current position in the popularity ranking (considering pages 1 to 5)
* the timestamp of the most recent loan
* the basket amount
Click magnifier icon for more info.  Or read Charlotte’s post at @Charlotte re: #346848
Also known as "CW," or "Charlotte's Web of Wonders"


We invite you to join us and make a difference, too. Please check the team board at 2 am Kiva time, 7 am Kiva time, 1 pm Kiva time and 6 pm Kiva time to coordinate lending.

See our team fund page:
http://www.kiva.org/lender/kivalllfund
teams.description:
Alan's account of the founding of LLL is on the  team board @Alan re: #260143. Loans that are nearing expiry won't get funded if they don't get noticed. We look for loans that are about to expire by using the Sort By:
"Expiring Soon" option instead of the default "Popularity", and then work to get them funded.

See our team FAQ, linked above (the "Team Website" button, next to our traffic light avatar).

A Team LLL glossary (contributed by team member Tony):

Red Loans: Loans that have less than five days to be funded, identifiable by the red box with the notice that says "Only x days left!" or 
"Only x hours and y minutes left!"

LLL - Late Loaning Lenders: this team, where 
lenders work together to keep loans from 
expiring.

SFDD - Starfish Daily Dozen: Under current 
practice, one of these lists is prepared and 
posted for each day, to help LLL lenders focus 
and coordinate their lending on a targeted 
group of loans (the Starfish or SF). The lists 
are prepared by a group of volunteers who 
seek to be objective in selecting the loans to 
be included in their lists. They also seek to 
spread out the loans in each list over a 24 hour 
period and to share the joy among the Field 
Partners with loans expiring during that period, 
but their efforts are always constrained by the 
choice of loans that are available for inclusion 
in the list. Loans with larger amounts needed 
will be included in the period immediately after 
each Credit Day, when lenders are feeling 
flush, but the lists will become less ambitious 
when the LLL lenders are feeling poor.

GG - Gorgeous Group: The SFDD list-makers usually add one or two of these loans at the end of the SF daily dozen lists. As the name 
implies, only group loans are picked. When it is 
first posted, a typical GG loan will expire two 
days or more after the list is posted. It will 
usually be retained as a GG until it becomes 
Fully Funded or moves into Starfish range. The amount needed when the loan is selected as a GG will vary depending on the time of month.

OPM - Abbreviation for "other people's money."  Our main lending method is to coordinate LLL team members' loans, so that we make several loans to a borrower within a short period of time. This will move the borrower's loan request up in Kiva's "popularity" sort and get the loan noticed by other people (non-members of the LLL team).  Many loans then get their funding completed by loans from those non-LLL members.  By attracting other lenders' attention to our Starfish loans in this way, we multiply the impact of our finite funds, and save more loans from expiring than we otherwise could.

RTR - Reduce the Red: These lists are 
prepared and posted when there are large 
numbers of loans slated to expire in a short 
period of time. "Red" is a reference to the red 
boxes that are added to a loan description 
when the Loan is about to expire without full 
funding.

Bulge: A short period in which a great many loans have their scheduled funding expiration times. This may happen when, for example, the volunteer coordinators at Kiva offer a promo of some kind to the editors & translators, to get them to do a lot of work in a very short period of time. Bulge loans are prime candidates for inclusion in Reduce the Red lists.

BTB - Battling the Boxes: On those days where 
there aren't 12 loans that qualify as "Starfish," the listmakers will include loans that have their red boxes, but more than 24 hours left before their deadline, to make up the 12 loans for the list. The criteria are similar to SF 
loans, i.e., one per field partner and reasonable 
amounts left to fund (not too much; not too 
little), except that these loans may have a longer time left before their expiry date. If they gain good traction on their first BTB day, they may be carried forward. If not ... they stand a second chance as SF.

FF - Fully Funded: This is LLL code for a loan 
that has received all the loans required for it to be removed from the list of loans that are raising funds 
and to move into paying back status.

Lars Ratio: the average funding per hour that is needed for a loan to become fully funded.
(Developed by team member Lars)

Wiedergänger (contributed by Maria) - German expression, literal translation "again walker," meaning "undead," i.e. a person that has died but comes back, aka a zombie. Here it means a loan that disappears from the page, but comes back again because somebody didn't check out their basket.

Ruma sana (contributed by Jouko and Potkukelkka) - Finnish expression, literal translation "ugly words."  It is a phrase to use when you are very frustrated, but want to stop just short of actual cursing -- for example, when the Kiva site repeatedly logs you out when you are trying to rescue an expiring loan at the last second.

See data about all loans currently fundraising on Kiva:
www.kivatools.com
See data about loans that have been mentioned on the LLL board, including the most recent lending activity on each loan:
http://starfish.dynalias.org/
See loans in real time, as they are made:
http://www.http://kivalive.com/index2.php

Lists are posted on the LLL Team message 
board. Join us!

teams.name: Team USA
teams.loan_because: We believe in the generosity of the human spirit that is still alive within Americans of all backgrounds.

teams.name: Kiva Flash Mob
teams.loan_because:
we want to bring lenders from different teams together and show some Kiva love to loans have so far been overlooked. We want to help get them funded by organizing a Flash Mob to these loans.  

The effect of many lenders loaning to the same loan at the same time is that the loan will show up on page 1 of the popularity sort, which is the default page that most lenders look at when they come to Kiva. So besides the loans from the Flash Mob team, Flash Mob loans often attract many additional loans from other lenders who just happened to log into Kiva at this time. Sometimes a loan gets completely funded within the hour!

Feel free to keep attributing your loans to your favorite team, it is fun to see many different team logos on the same loan.
teams.description:
Primary Flash Mob time is 9am US West Coast / noon EST / 6pm MET / 4am AET

If you can't join the primary Flash Mob, a second Flash Mob time is 11pm US West Coast / 2am EST / 8am MET / 6pm AET

The loan will be posted an hour or two in advance to give you time to research it. For maximum Flash Mob impact, please try to loan exactly at Flash Mob time.

For email alerts with just the daily loan link, please join http://www.kiva.org/team/KFM_messages and set your email preferences for that team to immediate delivery. For a comprehensive description of the Flash Mob loan, to talk to other Flash Mobbers and to suggest loans, please join this team. 

Loans selected for the Flash Mob are typically within 2 weeks of expiration (preferably red-boxed) and completely unfunded or lacking a substantial amount. For suggestions please message the captains.

teams.description:
One of P2P's major poverty-escaping projects is to participate in making microloans through the Kiva platform. See the web site for details on all of our projects. Also see our Perpetual Fund lender account which allows people to designate funds for perpetual loaning here on Kiva, http://www.kiva.org/lender/P2PPerpetualFund

We have a special purpose fund to keep loans from expiring. Please join us at http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans to see currently funding loans from the SOS Loan fund.

NOTE:  Poverty2Prosperity is also a non-profit, and any messages not related to Kiva or Poverty2Prosperity may be deleted.  If there is an idea you would like to share, contact one of the Team Captains to get permission.  Thank you for your consideration.

teams.name: Norway
teams.loan_because:
We have Cold Weather - Warm hearts !
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty. 

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe.
teams.description:
Bruk denne linken for å invitere dine venner til teamet her:
http://www.kiva.org/team/norway/recruit

Det er flott hvis du trykker Facebook "anbefale/recommend" knappen oppe til høyre  på denne siden. Vår facebookgruppe: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Kiva-Norway/193432017389484

Anbefalte lån "sikrere" lån: 
http://www.kiva.org/lend?sortBy=partner_default_min=0&partner_default_max=0.5&partner_risk_rating_min=1&partner_risk_rating_max=5&partner_arrears_min=0&partner_arrears_max=1.1&sortBy=repaymentTerm
Hjelp med "expiring loans": http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans/#fundraising_loans

Hjelp med "postdisbursed" lån:
http://kivatools.com/fundraising/postdisbursedloans

Kiva tools:
https://www.kiva.org/portfolio/collections
http://www.bhodisoft.com/kiva-country-collector/
http://www.bhodisoft.com/kfpc/
http://www.kivalens.org

Da har vi nådd målet på 2 million dollar utlånt. Takk til alle som har bidratt!

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

***TEAM WEBSITE***
http://apluskiva.wordpress.com/

***TEAM RESOURCES***
Secular Loans
http://goo.gl/wtDkJ

Field Partners - Social and Secular Ratings:
www.tinyurl.com/AASFSHNR-MFIs

***OTHER RESOURCES:***
Starfish List:
http://starfish.dynalias.org/

KivaLens:
http://www.kivalens.org/

Toolkit for analyzing Kiva data:
http://build.kiva.org/
